name: Aaaaa! - A Reckless Disregard for Gravity

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! - A Reckless Disregard for Gravity/main.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Desura installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! - A Reckless Disregard for
    Gravity/main.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /sp- /verysilent /norestart /suppressmsgboxes /nogui
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
